author: Shawn Saris
title: Daily Deals: Extended Free Trials for CBS All Access, Disney+, Kindle Unlimited and More
description: Don't miss out on your chance to get thousands of pieces of entertainment content for free thanks to these awesome free trials.
content: Welcome to the Sunday edition of our deals. It's all about trying to stay entertained at home, so we're highlighting all the free services you can sign up for right now to keep the boredom at bay. If that's not enough, check out our deals on Dell PCs or vario… [+7414 chars]
